short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that enables audio capture, preview and download from the current tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sample Tab Audio is a powerful yet user-friendly Chrome extension designed for anyone who wants to record and save audio directly from browser tabs. Ideal for music lovers, audio creators, and professionals, this extension makes audio sampling easy and efficient.

Key Features:

Customizable Settings: Choose between MP3 and WAV file formats, adjust pan recording, and enable auto-loop recording for repetitive tasks.
Visual Audio Previews: Get a clear waveform visualization of your audio recordings.
Effortless Controls: Start, stop, loop, and manage recordings with a clean and intuitive UI.
Instant Downloads: Save your audio recordings to your device in high-quality MP3 or WAV formats.
Whether you're sampling music, capturing meeting audio, or saving web sounds, Sample Tab Audio simplifies the process, delivering high-quality results with just a few clicks.
